38  #if (defined(ARK2D_ANDROID) || defined(ARK2D_IPHONE) || defined(ARK2D_MACINTOSH) || (defined(ARK2D_WINDOWS) && defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)) || defined(ARK2D_UBUNTU_LINUX) || defined(ARK2D_EMSCRIPTEN_JS) )
39 
40  bool Renderer::gluCheckExtensionARK(const GLubyte* extName, const GLubyte* extString) {
41  GLboolean flag=GL_FALSE;
42  char* word;
43  char* lookHere;
44  char* deleteThis;
45 
46  if (extString==NULL)
47  {
48  return GL_FALSE;
49  }
50 
51  deleteThis=lookHere=(char*)malloc(strlen((const char*)extString)+1);
52  if (lookHere==NULL)
53  {
54  return GL_FALSE;
55  }
56 
57  /* strtok() will modify string, so copy it somewhere */
58  strcpy(lookHere,(const char*)extString);
59 
60  while ((word=strtok(lookHere, " "))!=NULL)
61  {
62  if (strcmp(word,(const char*)extName)==0)
63  {
64  flag=GL_TRUE;
65  break;
66  }
67  lookHere=NULL; /* get next token */
68  }
69  free((void*)deleteThis);
70 
71  return flag;
72  }
73 
74  /*void Renderer::gl3wGenVertexArrays(GLsizei n, GLuint* arrays) {
75 
76  }
77  void Renderer::gl3wBindVertexArray(GLuint array) {
78 
79  } */
80 
81  #else
82 
83  bool Renderer::gluCheckExtensionARK(const GLubyte* extName, const GLubyte* extString) {
84  #if (defined(ARK2D_WINDOWS) || defined(ARK2D_FLASCC) || defined(ARK2D_WINDOWS_PHONE_8))
85  return false;
86  #else
87  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
88  return gluCheckExtension(extName, extString);
89  #endif
90  }

113  unsigned int RendererStats::s_textureSwaps = 0;
114  unsigned int RendererStats::s_shaderSwaps = 0;
115  unsigned int RendererStats::s_textureAllocatedBytes = 0;

117  RendererStats::RendererStats() {

120  void RendererStats::reset() {
121  s_glCalls = 0;
122  s_lines = 0;
123  s_tris = 0;
124  s_textureSwaps = 0;
125  s_shaderSwaps = 0;
126  // s_textureAllocatedBytes .. don't reset this.
127  }

133  // renderer state
134  int RendererState::s_renderMode = -1;
135  int RendererState::s_textureId = 0;
136  int RendererState::s_shaderId = 0;

140  void RendererState::start(int renderMode) {
141  start(renderMode, 0);//, 0);
142  }
143  void RendererState::start(int renderMode, int textureId) {
144  //start(renderMode, textureId);//, 0);
145 
146  /*#if defined(ARK2D_FLASCC)
147  if (renderMode == NONE) { startNone(); }
148  else if (renderMode == GEOMETRY) { startGeometry(); }
149  else if (renderMode == TEXTURE) { startTexture(textureId); }
150  else if (renderMode == SHADER) { startShader(textureId); }
151  #else */
152  if (renderMode == NONE) { startNone(); }
153  else if (renderMode == GEOMETRY && (renderMode != s_renderMode || s_renderMode == 0)) { startGeometry(); }
154  else if (renderMode == TEXTURE && (textureId != s_textureId || s_textureId == 0)) { startTexture(textureId); }
155  else if (renderMode == SHADER && (textureId != s_shaderId || s_shaderId == 0)) { startShader(textureId); }
156  // else if (renderMode == MULTITEXTURE && (textureId != s_multitextureId0 || s_multitextureId0 == 0 || textureId2 != s_multitextureId1 || s_multitextureId1 == 0)) { startMultitexture(textureId, textureId2); }
157  //#endif
158 
159  s_renderMode = renderMode;
160 
161  }
162  //void RendererState::start(int renderMode, int textureId, int textureId2)
163  //{
164  //
165  //}
166 
167  //void RendererState::start(int renderMode, Shader* s) {
168  // start(renderMode, s->getId());
169  //}
170 
171  void switchRendererState(unsigned int current, unsigned int to) {
172 
173  if (current == (unsigned int) RendererState::TEXTURE) {
174  RendererState::s_textureId = 0;
175  RendererStats::s_textureSwaps++;
176 
177  if (to == (unsigned int) RendererState::GEOMETRY || to == (unsigned int) RendererState::NONE) {
178 
179  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
180 
181  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0);
182  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
183 
184  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
185  glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
186  glDisableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
187  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 2;
188 
189  //glDisableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
190  #elif defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_ES_2_0)
191  glDisableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexPosition);
192  glDisableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexTexCoordIn);
193  glDisableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexColorIn);
194  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 3;
195  #endif
196 
197  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
198 
199 
200 
201  #endif
202 
203  }
204 
205  } else if (current == (unsigned int) RendererState::SHADER) {
206  RendererState::s_shaderId = 0;
207  RendererStats::s_shaderSwaps++;
208  //#ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
209  // glUseProgram(0);
210  //#endif
211  } else if (current == (unsigned int) RendererState::GEOMETRY) {
212  #if defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_ES_2_0)
213  glDisableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexPosition);
214  glDisableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexColorIn);
215  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 2;
216  #endif
217  }
218 
219  //#endif
220  }
221 
222  void RendererState::startNone() {
223  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("RendererState::startNone");
224  switchRendererState(s_renderMode, NONE);
225  }
226  void RendererState::startGeometry() {
227  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("RendererState::startGeometry");
228  switchRendererState(s_renderMode, GEOMETRY);
229 
230  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
231 
232  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
233  glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
234  glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
235  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 2;
236  #endif
237 
238 
239  #ifdef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
240  RendererStats::s_shaderSwaps++;
241 
242  unsigned int shaderId = Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry->getId();
243  glUseProgram(shaderId);
244  s_shaderId = shaderId;
245  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
246 
247  #if defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_ES_2_0)
248  glEnableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexPosition);
249  glEnableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexColorIn);
250  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 2;
251  #endif
252  #endif
253 
254  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
255 
256  Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry->bind();
257 
258  #endif
259  }
260  void RendererState::startTexture(int textureId) {
261  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("RendererState::startTexture");
262  switchRendererState(s_renderMode, TEXTURE);
263 
264  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
265 
266  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
267  glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
268  glEnableClientState(GL_TEXTURE_COORD_ARRAY);
269  glEnableClientState(GL_VERTEX_ARRAY);
270  glEnableClientState(GL_COLOR_ARRAY);
271  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 2;
272  #endif
273 
274  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureId);
275  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
276 
277  #ifdef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
278  RendererStats::s_shaderSwaps++;
279 
280  unsigned int shaderId = Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture->getId();
281  glUseProgram(shaderId);
282  s_shaderId = shaderId;
283  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
284 
285  #if defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_ES_2_0)
286  glEnableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexPosition);
287  glEnableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexTexCoordIn);
288  glEnableVertexAttribArray(Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexColorIn);
289  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 3;
290  #endif
291  #endif
292 
293  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
294 
295  ID3D11DeviceContext* deviceContext = ARK2D::getContainer()->getPlatformSpecific()->m_deviceContext;
296  Texture* tx = TextureStore::getInstance()->getTexture(textureId);
297  deviceContext->PSSetSamplers(0, 1, &tx->m_dxSampler);
298  deviceContext->PSSetShaderResources(0, 1, &tx->m_dxResourceView);
299  Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture->bind();
300 
301  #endif
302 
303  s_textureId = textureId;
304  RendererStats::s_textureSwaps++;
305  }
306  void RendererState::startShader(int shaderId) {
307  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("RendererState::startShader");
308  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("start shader");
309  switchRendererState(s_renderMode, SHADER);
310 
311  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
312  glUseProgram(shaderId);
313  #endif
314 
315  s_shaderId = shaderId;
316  RendererStats::s_shaderSwaps++;
317  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
318  }

323  // s_multitextureId0 = textureId0;
324  // s_multitextureId1 = textureId1;
325  // }
326 
327  void RendererState::internalBindTexture(int textureId) {
328  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
329 
330  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
331  glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
332  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
333  #endif
334 
335  glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
336  glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureId);
337  RendererStats::s_glCalls += 2;
338  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
339  //glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
340  //glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureId);
341  #endif
342 
343  s_textureId = textureId;
344  }

348  MatrixStack::MatrixStack(unsigned int type):
349  m_type(type),
350  m_stack(),
351  m_stackIndex(0),
352  m_dirty(true)
353  {
354  Matrix44<float> defaultMatrix;
355  m_stack.push_back(defaultMatrix);
356  }
357  void MatrixStack::translate(float x, float y, float z) {
358  // glTranslatef(x,y,0);
359  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).translate(x, y, z);
360  m_dirty = true;
361  }
362  void MatrixStack::rotate(float angle, float x, float y, float z) {
363  // glRotatef(angle, 0, 0, 1);
364  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).rotate(angle, x, y, z);
365  m_dirty = true;
366  }
367  void MatrixStack::scale(float x, float y, float z) {
368  // glScalef(x, y, 0.0f);
369  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).scale(x, y, z);
370  m_dirty = true;
371  }
372  void MatrixStack::ortho2d(float l, float r, float b, float t, float n, float f) {
373  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).ortho2d(l, r, b, t, n, f);
374  m_dirty = true;
375  }
376  void MatrixStack::frustum(float l, float r, float b, float t, float n, float f) {
377  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).frustum(l, r, b, t, n, r);
378  m_dirty = true;
379  }
380  void MatrixStack::perspective(float fov, float aspect, float n, float f) {
381  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).perspective(fov, aspect, n, f);
382  m_dirty = true;
383  }
384  void MatrixStack::lookAt(float eyeX, float eyeY, float eyeZ, float lookAtX, float lookAtY, float lookAtZ, float upX, float upY, float upZ) {
385  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).lookAt(eyeX, eyeY, eyeZ, lookAtX, lookAtY, lookAtZ, upX, upY, upZ);
386  m_dirty = true;
387  }
388  void MatrixStack::identity() {
389  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).identity();
390  m_dirty = true;
391  }
392  float* MatrixStack::data(float* mx) {
393  const Matrix44<float>& thismx = m_stack.at(m_stackIndex);
394  mx[0] = thismx[0][0];
395  mx[1] = thismx[0][1];
396  mx[2] = thismx[0][2];
397  mx[3] = thismx[0][3];
398  mx[4] = thismx[1][0];
399  mx[5] = thismx[1][1];
400  mx[6] = thismx[1][2];
401  mx[7] = thismx[1][3];
402  mx[8] = thismx[2][0];
403  mx[9] = thismx[2][1];
404  mx[10] = thismx[2][2];
405  mx[11] = thismx[2][3];
406  mx[12] = thismx[3][0];
407  mx[13] = thismx[3][1];
408  mx[14] = thismx[3][2];
409  mx[15] = thismx[3][3];
410  return &mx[0];
411  }
412  void* MatrixStack::pointer() {
413  return m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).pointer();
414  }
415 
416  void MatrixStack::setDirty(bool b) {
417  m_dirty = b;
418  }
419  bool MatrixStack::isDirty() {
420  return m_dirty;
421  }
422 
423  Matrix44<float>* MatrixStack::current() {
424  return &m_stack[m_stackIndex];
425  }
426 
427  #ifdef ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX
428  DirectX::XMMATRIX MatrixStack::d3dpointer() {
429  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("Updating Matrix Buffer...");
430 
431  /*float* d = (float*) m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).pointer();
432 
433  ID3D11DeviceContext* deviceContext = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_deviceContext;
434  D3D11_MAPPED_SUBRESOURCE mappedResource;
435  HRESULT result = deviceContext->Map(m_d3d_buffer, 0, D3D11_MAP_WRITE_DISCARD, 0, &mappedResource);
436  if (FAILED(result)) {
437  ARK2D::getLog()->e(StringUtil::append("Could not Update (Map) Matrix Buffer (d3dpointer): ", m_type));
438  return m_d3d_matrix;
439  }
440  void* dataPtr = (void*) mappedResource.pData;
441  memcpy(dataPtr, d, sizeof(float) * 16);
442  deviceContext->Unmap(m_d3d_buffer, 0);*/
443 
444  const Matrix44<float>& thismx = m_stack.at(m_stackIndex);
445  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("1");
446 
447  using namespace DirectX;
448 
449 
450 
451  // switched row-major for column-major!
452  /*
453  XMMATRIX m_d3d_matrix;
454  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[0][0]);
455  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[1][0]);
456  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[2][0]);
457  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[3][0]);
458 
459  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[0][1]);
460  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[1][1]);
461  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[2][1]);
462  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[3][1]);
463 
464  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[0][2]);
465  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[1][2]);
466  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[2][2]);
467  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[3][2]);
468 
469  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[0][3]);
470  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[1][3]);
471  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[2][3]);
472  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[3][3]);*/
473 
474  /*XMMATRIX m_d3d_matrix;
475  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[0][0]);
476  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[0][1]);
477  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[0][2]);
478  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[0], thismx[0][3]);
479 
480  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[1][0]);
481  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[1][1]);
482  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[1][2]);
483  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[1], thismx[1][3]);
484 
485  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[2][0]);
486  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[2][1]);
487  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[2][2]);
488  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[2], thismx[2][3]);
489 
490  XMVectorSetX(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[3][0]);
491  XMVectorSetY(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[3][1]);
492  XMVectorSetW(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[3][2]);
493  XMVectorSetZ(m_d3d_matrix.r[3], thismx[3][3]);*/
494 
495  XMMATRIX m_d3d_matrix = XMMATRIX(
496  thismx[0][0], thismx[0][1], thismx[0][2], thismx[0][3],
497  thismx[1][0], thismx[1][1], thismx[1][2], thismx[1][3],
498  thismx[2][0], thismx[2][1], thismx[2][2], thismx[2][3],
499  thismx[3][0], thismx[3][1], thismx[3][2], thismx[3][3]
500  );
501 
502  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("4");
503  return m_d3d_matrix;
504  //return NULL;
505 
506  }
507  #endif
508 
509  void MatrixStack::toStringDialog() {
510  float mx[16];
511  data(&mx[0]);
512 
513  float* mx2;
514  mx2 = (float*) pointer();
515 
516  string compareStr = "";
517  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < 16; i++) {
518  compareStr += "{";
519  compareStr += Cast::toString<float>(mx[i]);
520  compareStr += ",";
521  compareStr += Cast::toString<float>(mx2[i]);
522  compareStr += "}, ";
523  }
524  ErrorDialog::createAndShow(compareStr);
525  }
526  void MatrixStack::pushMatrix() {
527  //Matrix44<float> copy = m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).copy();
528  //m_stack.push_back(copy);
529  m_stackIndex++;
530 
531  if (m_stackIndex >= m_stack.size()) {
532  Matrix44<float> copy = m_stack.at(m_stackIndex-1).copy();
533  m_stack.push_back(copy);
534  } else {
535  m_stack.at(m_stackIndex).set(m_stack.at(m_stackIndex-1));
536  }
537 
538  m_dirty = true;
539  }
540  void MatrixStack::popMatrix() {
541 
542  if (m_stackIndex == 0) {
543  ARK2D::getLog()->e("Cannot pop Matrix Stack below 0.");
544  return;
545  }
546  //m_stack.pop_back();
547  m_stackIndex--;
548 
549  m_dirty = true;
550  }
551  MatrixStack::~MatrixStack() {
552 
553  }

558 
559  // BATCH STUFF
560  RendererBatch* Renderer::s_batch = new RendererBatch();
561  RendererBatchItem::RendererBatchItem():
562  geomtris(),
563  textris(),
564  m_type(TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS),
565  m_textureId(0)
566  {
567 
568  }
569  void RendererBatchItem::clear() {
570  geomtris.clear();
571  textris.clear();
572  m_type = TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS;
573  m_textureId = 0;
574  }
575 
576  void* dx_fillTriangles_data = NULL;
577  unsigned int dx_fillTriangles_size = 0;
578 
579  void* dx_texturedTriangles_data = NULL;
580  unsigned int dx_texturedTriangles_size = 0;
581 
582  void* dx_renderBatch_data = NULL;
583  unsigned int dx_renderBatch_size = 0;
584 
585  void RendererBatchItem::renderDX() {
586  #ifdef ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX
587  // Optimisations for DirectX. Less memory allocated.
588  if (m_type == TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS)
589  {
590  unsigned int countTriangles = geomtris.size();
591  if (countTriangles == 0) { clear(); return; }
592 
593  RendererState::start(RendererState::GEOMETRY);
594 
595  ID3D11Device* device = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_device;
596  ID3D11DeviceContext* deviceContext = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_deviceContext;
597 
598  Renderer::__internalsDXUpdateMatrices();
599 
600  unsigned int countVerts = countTriangles * 3;
601  unsigned int memorySize = countVerts * sizeof(Renderer_DX_InterleavingGeometryVertexData);
602 
603  if (dx_renderBatch_data == NULL || dx_renderBatch_size < memorySize) {
604  dx_renderBatch_data = realloc(dx_renderBatch_data, memorySize);
605  dx_renderBatch_size = memorySize;
606  }
607 
608  Renderer_DX_InterleavingGeometryVertexData* rawVertices = (Renderer_DX_InterleavingGeometryVertexData*) dx_renderBatch_data;
609  unsigned int count = 0;
610  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < countVerts; i +=3) {
611  RendererBatchItem_GeomTri* tri = &geomtris[count];
612  rawVertices[i].vertex = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->vertexData[0], tri->vertexData[1], 0.0f, 0.0f);
613  rawVertices[i].color = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->colorData[0]/255.0f, tri->colorData[1]/255.0f, tri->colorData[2]/255.0f, tri->colorData[3]/255.0f);
614 
615  rawVertices[i+1].vertex = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->vertexData[2], tri->vertexData[3], 0.0f, 0.0f);
616  rawVertices[i+1].color = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->colorData[4]/255.0f, tri->colorData[5]/255.0f, tri->colorData[6]/255.0f, tri->colorData[7]/255.0f);
617 
618  rawVertices[i+2].vertex = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->vertexData[4], tri->vertexData[5], 0.0f, 0.0f);
619  rawVertices[i+2].color = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->colorData[8]/255.0f, tri->colorData[9]/255.0f, tri->colorData[10]/255.0f, tri->colorData[11]/255.0f);
620 
621  count++;
622  }
623  Renderer::s_vboQuadVerts->setData((void*)&rawVertices[0], memorySize);
624 
625  unsigned int stride = sizeof(Renderer_DX_InterleavingGeometryVertexData);
626  unsigned int offset = 0;
627  deviceContext->IASetVertexBuffers(0, 1, &Renderer::s_vboQuadVerts->m_buffer, &stride, &offset);
628  deviceContext->IASetPrimitiveTopology(D3D11_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLELIST);
629  deviceContext->Draw(countVerts, 0);
630 
631  }
632  else if (m_type == TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS)
633  {
634  unsigned int countTriangles = textris.size();
635  if (countTriangles == 0) { clear(); return; }
636 
637  RendererState::start(RendererState::TEXTURE, m_textureId);
638 
639  ID3D11Device* device = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_device;
640  ID3D11DeviceContext* deviceContext = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_deviceContext;
641 
642  Renderer::__internalsDXUpdateMatrices();
643 
644  unsigned int countVerts = countTriangles * 3;
645  unsigned int memorySize = countVerts * sizeof(Renderer_DX_InterleavingTextureVertexData);
646 
647  if (dx_renderBatch_data == NULL || dx_renderBatch_size < memorySize) {
648  dx_renderBatch_data = realloc(dx_renderBatch_data, memorySize);
649  dx_renderBatch_size = memorySize;
650  }
651 
652  Renderer_DX_InterleavingTextureVertexData* rawVertices = (Renderer_DX_InterleavingTextureVertexData*) dx_renderBatch_data;
653  unsigned int count = 0;
654  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < countVerts; i +=3) {
655  RendererBatchItem_TexTri* tri = &textris[count];
656  rawVertices[i].vertex = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->vertexData[0], tri->vertexData[1], 0.0f, 0.0f);
657  rawVertices[i].texcoord = DirectX::XMFLOAT2(tri->textureData[0], tri->textureData[1]);
658  rawVertices[i].color = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->colorData[0]/255.0f, tri->colorData[1]/255.0f, tri->colorData[2]/255.0f, tri->colorData[3]/255.0f);
659 
660  rawVertices[i+1].vertex = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->vertexData[2], tri->vertexData[3], 0.0f, 0.0f);
661  rawVertices[i+1].texcoord = DirectX::XMFLOAT2(tri->textureData[2], tri->textureData[3]);
662  rawVertices[i+1].color = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->colorData[4]/255.0f, tri->colorData[5]/255.0f, tri->colorData[6]/255.0f, tri->colorData[7]/255.0f);
663 
664  rawVertices[i+2].vertex = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->vertexData[4], tri->vertexData[5], 0.0f, 0.0f);
665  rawVertices[i+2].texcoord = DirectX::XMFLOAT2(tri->textureData[4], tri->textureData[5]);
666  rawVertices[i+2].color = DirectX::XMFLOAT4(tri->colorData[8]/255.0f, tri->colorData[9]/255.0f, tri->colorData[10]/255.0f, tri->colorData[11]/255.0f);
667 
668  count++;
669  }
670  Renderer::s_vboQuadVerts->setData((void*)&rawVertices[0], memorySize);
671 
672  unsigned int stride = sizeof(Renderer_DX_InterleavingTextureVertexData);
673  unsigned int offset = 0;
674  deviceContext->IASetVertexBuffers(0, 1, &Renderer::s_vboQuadVerts->m_buffer, &stride, &offset);
675  deviceContext->IASetPrimitiveTopology(D3D11_PRIMITIVE_TOPOLOGY_TRIANGLELIST);
676  deviceContext->Draw(countVerts, 0);
677  }
678  #endif
679  clear();
680  }
681  void RendererBatchItem::render() {
682  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
683  renderDX();
684  #else
685  if (m_type == TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS)
686  {
687  unsigned int tsz = geomtris.size();
688  int sz = tsz * 6;
689  if (sz == 0) { clear(); return; }
690 
691  #ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_VS
692  float* all_vertexData = (float*) alloca(sz * sizeof(float));
693  unsigned char* all_colorData = (unsigned char*)alloca(sz * 2 * sizeof(unsigned char));
694 
695  Assert(all_vertexData);
696  Assert(all_colorData);
697  #else
698  float all_vertexData[sz];
699  unsigned char all_colorData[sz*2];
700  #endif
701 
702 
703  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < tsz; i++) {
704  memcpy(&all_vertexData[i*6], &geomtris[i].vertexData, sizeof(float) * 6);
705  memcpy(&all_colorData[i*12], &geomtris[i].colorData, sizeof(unsigned char) * 12);
706  }
707 
708  ARK2D::getRenderer()->fillTriangles(&all_vertexData[0], &all_colorData[0], tsz, true);
709 
710  //#ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_VS
711  // free(all_vertexData);
712  // free(all_colorData);
713  //#endif
714  }
715  else if (m_type == TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS)
716  {
717  unsigned int tsz = textris.size();
718  int sz = tsz * 6;
719  if (sz == 0) { clear(); return; }
720 
721  #ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_VS
722  float* all_vertexData = (float*) alloca(sz * sizeof(float));
723  float* all_textureData = (float*) alloca(sz * sizeof(float));
724  unsigned char* all_colorData = (unsigned char*) alloca(sz * 2 * sizeof(unsigned char) );
725 
726  Assert(all_vertexData);
727  Assert(all_textureData);
728  Assert(all_colorData);
729  #else
730  float all_vertexData[sz];
731  float all_textureData[sz];
732  unsigned char all_colorData[sz*2];
733  #endif
734 
735  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < tsz; i++) {
736  memcpy(&all_vertexData[i*6], &textris[i].vertexData, sizeof(float) * 6);
737  memcpy(&all_textureData[i*6], &textris[i].textureData, sizeof(float) * 6);
738  memcpy(&all_colorData[i*12], &textris[i].colorData, sizeof(unsigned char) * 12);
739  }
740 
741  ARK2D::getRenderer()->texturedTriangles(m_textureId, &all_vertexData[0], &all_textureData[0], &all_colorData[0], tsz, true);
742 
743  //#ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_VS
744  // free(all_vertexData);
745  // free(all_textureData);
746  // free(all_colorData);
747  //#endif
748  }
749  clear();
750  #endif
751  }
752  RendererBatchItem::~RendererBatchItem() {
753  clear();
754  }
755 
756  RendererBatchItem_GeomTri::RendererBatchItem_GeomTri():
757  vertexData(),
758  colorData()
759  {
760  //vertexData[0] = 0;
761  //vertexData[1] = 0;
762  //vertexData[2] = 0;
763  //vertexData[3] = 0;
764  //vertexData[4] = 0;
765  //vertexData[5] = 0;
766  }
767  RendererBatchItem_TexTri::RendererBatchItem_TexTri():
768  vertexData(),
769  textureData(),
770  colorData()
771  {
772 
773  }
774 
775  RendererBatch::RendererBatch():
776  items(),
777  enabled(false)
778  {
779 
780  }
781  void RendererBatch::addGeometryTri(float* verts, unsigned char* colors)
782  {
783  /*if (items.size() == 0 || items.at(items.size()-1).m_type == RendererBatchItem::TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS) {
784  items.push_back(RendererBatchItem());
785  }
786  RendererBatchItem* item = &items.at(items.size()-1);
787  item->m_type = RendererBatchItem::TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS;
788  item->m_textureId = 0;
789 
790  RendererBatchItem_GeomTri one;
791  memcpy(&one.vertexData[0], verts, sizeof(float) * 6);
792  memcpy(&one.colorData[0], colors, sizeof(unsigned char) * 12);
793  item->geomtris.push_back(one);*/
794 
795  addGeometryTri(
796  verts[0], verts[1],
797  verts[2], verts[3],
798  verts[4], verts[5],
799  colors[0], colors[1], colors[2], colors[3],
800  colors[4], colors[5], colors[6], colors[7],
801  colors[8], colors[9], colors[10], colors[11]
802  );
803  }
804  void RendererBatch::addGeometryTri(
805  float x1, float y1,
806  float x2, float y2,
807  float x3, float y3,
808  unsigned char c1r, unsigned char c1g, unsigned char c1b, unsigned char c1a,
809  unsigned char c2r, unsigned char c2g, unsigned char c2b, unsigned char c2a,
810  unsigned char c3r, unsigned char c3g, unsigned char c3b, unsigned char c3a)
811  {
812  if (items.size() == 0 || items.at(items.size()-1).m_type == RendererBatchItem::TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS) {
813  items.push_back(RendererBatchItem());
814  }
815 
816  RendererBatchItem* item = &items.at(items.size()-1);
817  item->m_type = RendererBatchItem::TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS;
818  item->m_textureId = 0;
819 
820  RendererBatchItem_GeomTri one;
821  one.vertexData[0] = x1;
822  one.vertexData[1] = y1;
823  one.vertexData[2] = x2;
824  one.vertexData[3] = y2;
825  one.vertexData[4] = x3;
826  one.vertexData[5] = y3;
827  one.colorData[0] = c1r;
828  one.colorData[1] = c1g;
829  one.colorData[2] = c1b;
830  one.colorData[3] = c1a;
831  one.colorData[4] = c2r;
832  one.colorData[5] = c2g;
833  one.colorData[6] = c2b;
834  one.colorData[7] = c2a;
835  one.colorData[8] = c3r;
836  one.colorData[9] = c3g;
837  one.colorData[10] = c3b;
838  one.colorData[11] = c3a;
839  item->geomtris.push_back(one);
840 
841  }
842  void RendererBatch::addGeometryQuad(
843  float x1, float y1,
844  float x2, float y2,
845  float x3, float y3,
846  float x4, float y4,
847  unsigned char c1r, unsigned char c1g, unsigned char c1b, unsigned char c1a,
848  unsigned char c2r, unsigned char c2g, unsigned char c2b, unsigned char c2a,
849  unsigned char c3r, unsigned char c3g, unsigned char c3b, unsigned char c3a,
850  unsigned char c4r, unsigned char c4g, unsigned char c4b, unsigned char c4a)
851  {
852  if (items.size() == 0 || items.at(items.size()-1).m_type == RendererBatchItem::TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS) {
853  items.push_back(RendererBatchItem());
854  }
855  RendererBatchItem* item = &items.at(items.size()-1);
856  item->m_type = RendererBatchItem::TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS;
857  item->m_textureId = 0;
858 
859  RendererBatchItem_GeomTri one;
860  one.vertexData[0] = x1;
861  one.vertexData[1] = y1;
862  one.vertexData[2] = x2;
863  one.vertexData[3] = y2;
864  one.vertexData[4] = x3;
865  one.vertexData[5] = y3;
866  one.colorData[0] = c1r;
867  one.colorData[1] = c1g;
868  one.colorData[2] = c1b;
869  one.colorData[3] = c1a;
870  one.colorData[4] = c2r;
871  one.colorData[5] = c2g;
872  one.colorData[6] = c2b;
873  one.colorData[7] = c2a;
874  one.colorData[8] = c3r;
875  one.colorData[9] = c3g;
876  one.colorData[10] = c3b;
877  one.colorData[11] = c3a;
878  item->geomtris.push_back(one);
879 
880  RendererBatchItem_GeomTri two;
881  two.vertexData[0] = x3;
882  two.vertexData[1] = y3;
883  two.vertexData[2] = x2;
884  two.vertexData[3] = y2;
885  two.vertexData[4] = x4;
886  two.vertexData[5] = y4;
887  two.colorData[0] = c3r;
888  two.colorData[1] = c3g;
889  two.colorData[2] = c3b;
890  two.colorData[3] = c3a;
891  two.colorData[4] = c2r;
892  two.colorData[5] = c2g;
893  two.colorData[6] = c2b;
894  two.colorData[7] = c2a;
895  two.colorData[8] = c4r;
896  two.colorData[9] = c4g;
897  two.colorData[10] = c4b;
898  two.colorData[11] = c4a;
899  item->geomtris.push_back(two);
900  }
901 
902  void RendererBatch::addTexturedTri(unsigned int texId, float* verts, float* texcoords, unsigned char* colors)
903  {
904  addTexturedTri(
905  texId,
906  verts[0], verts[1],
907  verts[2], verts[3],
908  verts[4], verts[5],
909  texcoords[0], texcoords[1],
910  texcoords[2], texcoords[3],
911  texcoords[4], texcoords[5],
912  colors[0], colors[1], colors[2], colors[3],
913  colors[4], colors[5], colors[6], colors[7],
914  colors[8], colors[9], colors[10], colors[11]
915  );
916  }
917  void RendererBatch::addTexturedTri(
918  unsigned int texId,
919  float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3,
920  float tx1, float ty1, float tx2, float ty2, float tx3, float ty3,
921  unsigned char c1r, unsigned char c1g, unsigned char c1b, unsigned char c1a,
922  unsigned char c2r, unsigned char c2g, unsigned char c2b, unsigned char c2a,
923  unsigned char c3r, unsigned char c3g, unsigned char c3b, unsigned char c3a)
924  {
925  if (items.size() == 0 || items.at(items.size()-1).m_type == RendererBatchItem::TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS || items.at(items.size()-1).m_textureId != texId) {
926  items.push_back(RendererBatchItem());
927  }
928 
929  RendererBatchItem* item = &items.at(items.size()-1);
930  item->m_type = RendererBatchItem::TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS;
931  item->m_textureId = texId;
932 
933  RendererBatchItem_TexTri one;
934  one.vertexData[0] = x1;
935  one.vertexData[1] = y1;
936  one.vertexData[2] = x2;
937  one.vertexData[3] = y2;
938  one.vertexData[4] = x3;
939  one.vertexData[5] = y3;
940  one.textureData[0] = tx1;
941  one.textureData[1] = ty1;
942  one.textureData[2] = tx2;
943  one.textureData[3] = ty2;
944  one.textureData[4] = tx3;
945  one.textureData[5] = ty3;
946  one.colorData[0] = c1r;
947  one.colorData[1] = c1g;
948  one.colorData[2] = c1b;
949  one.colorData[3] = c1a;
950  one.colorData[4] = c2r;
951  one.colorData[5] = c2g;
952  one.colorData[6] = c2b;
953  one.colorData[7] = c2a;
954  one.colorData[8] = c3r;
955  one.colorData[9] = c3g;
956  one.colorData[10] = c3b;
957  one.colorData[11] = c3a;
958  item->textris.push_back(one);
959 
960  }
961  void RendererBatch::addTexturedQuad(unsigned int texId, float* verts, float* texcoords, unsigned char* colors) {
962  addTexturedQuad(
963  texId,
964 
965  verts[0], verts[1],
966  verts[2], verts[3],
967  verts[4], verts[5],
968  verts[10], verts[11],
969 
970  texcoords[0], texcoords[1],
971  texcoords[2], texcoords[3],
972  texcoords[4], texcoords[5],
973  texcoords[10], texcoords[11],
974 
975  colors[0], colors[1], colors[2], colors[3],
976  colors[4], colors[5], colors[6], colors[7],
977  colors[8], colors[9], colors[10], colors[11],
978  colors[20], colors[21], colors[22], colors[23]
979  );
980  }
981  void RendererBatch::addTexturedQuad(
982  unsigned int texId,
983  float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, float x3, float y3, float x4, float y4,
984  float tx1, float ty1, float tx2, float ty2, float tx3, float ty3, float tx4, float ty4,
985  unsigned char c1r, unsigned char c1g, unsigned char c1b, unsigned char c1a,
986  unsigned char c2r, unsigned char c2g, unsigned char c2b, unsigned char c2a,
987  unsigned char c3r, unsigned char c3g, unsigned char c3b, unsigned char c3a,
988  unsigned char c4r, unsigned char c4g, unsigned char c4b, unsigned char c4a) {
989 
990  if (items.size() == 0 || items.at(items.size()-1).m_type == RendererBatchItem::TYPE_GEOMETRY_TRIS || items.at(items.size()-1).m_textureId != texId) {
991  items.push_back(RendererBatchItem());
992  }
993  RendererBatchItem* item = &items.at(items.size()-1);
994  item->m_type = RendererBatchItem::TYPE_TEXTURE_TRIS;
995  item->m_textureId = texId;
996 
997  RendererBatchItem_TexTri one;
998  one.vertexData[0] = x1;
999  one.vertexData[1] = y1;
1000  one.vertexData[2] = x2;
1001  one.vertexData[3] = y2;
1002  one.vertexData[4] = x3;
1003  one.vertexData[5] = y3;
1004  one.textureData[0] = tx1;
1005  one.textureData[1] = ty1;
1006  one.textureData[2] = tx2;
1007  one.textureData[3] = ty2;
1008  one.textureData[4] = tx3;
1009  one.textureData[5] = ty3;
1010  one.colorData[0] = c1r;
1011  one.colorData[1] = c1g;
1012  one.colorData[2] = c1b;
1013  one.colorData[3] = c1a;
1014  one.colorData[4] = c2r;
1015  one.colorData[5] = c2g;
1016  one.colorData[6] = c2b;
1017  one.colorData[7] = c2a;
1018  one.colorData[8] = c3r;
1019  one.colorData[9] = c3g;
1020  one.colorData[10] = c3b;
1021  one.colorData[11] = c3a;
1022  item->textris.push_back(one);
1023 
1024  RendererBatchItem_TexTri two;
1025  two.vertexData[0] = x3;
1026  two.vertexData[1] = y3;
1027  two.vertexData[2] = x2;
1028  two.vertexData[3] = y2;
1029  two.vertexData[4] = x4;
1030  two.vertexData[5] = y4;
1031  two.textureData[0] = tx3;
1032  two.textureData[1] = ty3;
1033  two.textureData[2] = tx2;
1034  two.textureData[3] = ty2;
1035  two.textureData[4] = tx4;
1036  two.textureData[5] = ty4;
1037  two.colorData[0] = c3r;
1038  two.colorData[1] = c3g;
1039  two.colorData[2] = c3b;
1040  two.colorData[3] = c3a;
1041  two.colorData[4] = c2r;
1042  two.colorData[5] = c2g;
1043  two.colorData[6] = c2b;
1044  two.colorData[7] = c2a;
1045  two.colorData[8] = c4r;
1046  two.colorData[9] = c4g;
1047  two.colorData[10] = c4b;
1048  two.colorData[11] = c4a;
1049  item->textris.push_back(two);
1050  }
1051  void RendererBatch::render() {
1052  for(unsigned int i = 0; i < items.size(); i++) {
1053  items[i].render();
1054  }
1055  items.clear();
1056  }
1057  RendererBatch::~RendererBatch() {
1058 
1059  }
1060 
1061 
1062 
1063 
1064 
1065 
1066 
1067 
1068 
1069 
1070 
1071 
1072 
1073  // renderer static
1074  signed int Renderer::s_interpolation = Renderer::INTERPOLATION_NEAREST;
1075  signed int Renderer::getInterpolation() {
1076  return s_interpolation;
1077  }
1078  void Renderer::setInterpolation(signed int i) {
1079  s_interpolation = i;
1080  }
1081  unsigned int Renderer::getInterpolationGL() {
1082  #ifdef ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL
1083  switch(s_interpolation) {
1084  case INTERPOLATION_NEAREST:
1085  return GL_NEAREST;
1086  case INTERPOLATION_LINEAR:
1087  return GL_LINEAR;
1088  }
1089  return GL_NEAREST;
1090  #else
1091  return 0;
1092  #endif
1093  }
1094 
1095  // -------------------------------
1096  // MATRIX STUFF
1097  // -------------------------------
1098  MatrixStack* Renderer::s_matrixProjection = NULL;
1099  MatrixStack* Renderer::s_matrixModelView = NULL;
1100  MatrixStack* Renderer::s_matrix = NULL;
1101  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1102  ID3D11Buffer* Renderer::s_d3d_matrixBuffer = NULL;
1103  CD3D11_BUFFER_DESC Renderer::s_d3d_matrixBufferDesc;
1104  Renderer_DX_ModelViewProjectionMatrixBuffer* Renderer::s_d3d_matrixBufferData = NULL;
1105  #endif
1106 
1107  MatrixStack* Renderer::getMatrix() {
1108  return s_matrix;
1109  }
1110  MatrixStack* Renderer::getMatrix(unsigned int type) {
1111  if (type == MatrixStack::TYPE_PROJECTION) { return s_matrixProjection; }
1112  else if (type == MatrixStack::TYPE_MODELVIEW) { return s_matrixModelView; }
1113  ARK2D::getLog()->e(StringUtil::append("Trying to retrieve invalid matrix", type));
1114  return NULL;
1115  }
1116  void Renderer::multiplyMatrix(Matrix44<float>* by) {
1117  Matrix44<float>* subject = &s_matrix->m_stack[s_matrix->m_stackIndex];
1118  *subject *= *by;
1119  }
1120  void Renderer::matrixMode(unsigned int mode) {
1121  //ARK2D::getLog()->i("matrixMode");
1122  if (mode == MatrixStack::TYPE_PROJECTION) {
1123  s_matrix = s_matrixProjection;
1124 
1125  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1126  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("fixed-function-pipeline");
1127  glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
1128  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1129  #endif
1130 
1131  } else if (mode == MatrixStack::TYPE_MODELVIEW) {
1132  s_matrix = s_matrixModelView;
1133 
1134  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1135  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("fixed-function-pipeline");
1136  glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
1137  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1138  #endif
1139 
1140  } else {
1141  ARK2D::getLog()->e(StringUtil::append("Invalid Matrix Mode", mode));
1142  }
1143  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1144  }
1145  void Renderer::pushMatrix() const {
1146  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("pushMatrix");
1147 
1148  s_matrix->pushMatrix();
1149  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1150  glPushMatrix();
1151  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1152  //glLoadMatrixf((float*)s_matrix->pointer());
1153  #endif
1154 
1155  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1156  }
1157  void Renderer::popMatrix() const {
1158  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("popMatrix");
1159 
1160  s_matrix->popMatrix();
1161  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1162  glPopMatrix();
1163  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1164  // glLoadMatrixf((float*)s_matrix->pointer());
1165  #endif
1166 
1167  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1168  }
1169  void Renderer::loadIdentity() const {
1170  //ARK2D::getLog()->i("loadIdentity");
1171 
1172  s_matrix->identity(); // only changes the topmost matrix.
1173  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1174  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("fixed-function-pipeline");
1175  glLoadIdentity();
1176  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1177  #endif
1178 
1179  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1180  }
1181 
1182  void Renderer::loadMatrix(Matrix44<float>* m) const {
1183  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1184  glLoadMatrixf((const GLfloat*) m->pointer());//->m_x->m_x);
1185  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1186  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1187  #endif
1188  }
1189  void Renderer::loadMatrix(const Matrix44<float>& m) const {
1190  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1191  glLoadMatrixf((const GLfloat*) m.pointer());//&m[0][0]);
1192  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1193  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1194  #endif
1195  }
1196  void Renderer::resetMatrix() const {
1197  loadIdentity();
1198  }
1199

1205  return s_shaderCurrent;
1206  }

1210  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_ProjectionMatrix = 0;
1211  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexPosition = 0;
1212  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexColorIn = 0;
1213  Shader* Renderer::getBasicGeometryShader() {

1215  }

1219  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_ProjectionMatrix = 0;
1220  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexPosition = 0;
1221  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexColorIn = 0;
1222  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexTexCoordIn = 0;
1223  unsigned int Renderer::s_shaderBasicTexture_TextureId = 0;

1229  // VAO and VBO bits
1230  Mat44VBO* Renderer::s_vboMatrixProjection = new Mat44VBO();
1231  Mat44VBO* Renderer::s_vboMatrixModelView = new Mat44VBO();
1232  QuadVBO* Renderer::s_vboQuadVerts = new QuadVBO();
1233  QuadVBO* Renderer::s_vboQuadTexCoords = new QuadVBO();
1234  QuadVBO* Renderer::s_vboQuadColors = new QuadVBO();
1235  VBO* Renderer::s_vboIndices = new VBO();
1236  VAO* Renderer::s_vaoQuad = new VAO();
1237 
1238  VBO::VBO():
1239  m_id(0),
1240  m_msize(0)
1241  #if defined( ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX )
1242  , m_buffer(NULL)
1243  , m_bufferDesc()
1244  , m_bufferData()
1245  #endif
1246  {
1247 
1248  }
1249  void VBO::setSize(unsigned int szbytes) {
1250  ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Setting buffer sz: ", szbytes));
1251  m_msize = szbytes;
1252  }
1253  unsigned int VBO::getId() {
1254  return m_id;
1255  }
1256  void VBO::init() {
1257  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1258  glGenBuffers(1, &m_id);
1259  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1260 
1261  ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Buffer sz: ", m_msize));
1262 
1263  void* data = malloc( m_msize );
1264 
1265  D3D11_BUFFER_DESC vertexBufferDesc = {0};
1266  ZeroMemory(&vertexBufferDesc, sizeof(vertexBufferDesc));
1267 
1268  vertexBufferDesc.ByteWidth = m_msize;
1269  vertexBufferDesc.Usage = D3D11_USAGE_DYNAMIC;
1270  vertexBufferDesc.BindFlags = m_indexType; // D3D11_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER or D3D11_BIND_INDEX_BUFFER.
1271  vertexBufferDesc.CPUAccessFlags = D3D11_CPU_ACCESS_WRITE;
1272  vertexBufferDesc.MiscFlags = 0;
1273  vertexBufferDesc.StructureByteStride = 0;
1274 
1275  D3D11_SUBRESOURCE_DATA vertexBufferData = {0};
1276  ZeroMemory(&vertexBufferData, sizeof(vertexBufferData));
1277  vertexBufferData.pSysMem = data;
1278  vertexBufferData.SysMemPitch = 0;
1279  vertexBufferData.SysMemSlicePitch = 0;
1280 
1281  ID3D11Device* device = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_device;
1282  m_result = device->CreateBuffer(&vertexBufferDesc, NULL, &m_buffer);
1283  if (FAILED(m_result)) {
1284  string s = StringUtil::append("Could not set data of VBO.", HRESULT_CODE(m_result));
1285  ErrorDialog::createAndShow(s);
1286  exit(0);
1287  }
1288 
1289  m_bufferData = vertexBufferData;
1290  m_bufferDesc = vertexBufferDesc;
1291 
1292  /*m_bufferDesc.Usage = D3D11_USAGE_DYNAMIC;//D3D11_USAGE_DEFAULT;
1293  m_bufferDesc.ByteWidth = 0;//size; //sizeof(VertexType) * m_vertexCount;
1294  m_bufferDesc.BindFlags = D3D11_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER;
1295  m_bufferDesc.CPUAccessFlags = 0;
1296  m_bufferDesc.MiscFlags = 0;
1297  m_bufferDesc.StructureByteStride = 0;
1298 
1299  m_bufferData.pSysMem = NULL;
1300  m_bufferData.SysMemPitch = 0;
1301  m_bufferData.SysMemSlicePitch = 0;
1302 
1303  ID3D11Device* device = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_device;
1304  m_result = device->CreateBuffer(&m_bufferDesc, &m_bufferData, &m_buffer);
1305  if (FAILED(m_result)) {
1306  ErrorDialog::createAndShow("Could not set data of VBO.");
1307  exit(0);
1308  }*/
1309  #endif
1310  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1311  }
1312  void VBO::setData(void* data, unsigned int size) {
1313  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1314 
1315  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, size, data, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
1316 
1317  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1318 
1319  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("Updating VBO...");
1320  ID3D11DeviceContext* context = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_deviceContext;
1321 
1322  if (size > m_msize) {
1323 
1324  // dynamically resize this buffer. eesh.
1325  m_buffer->Release();
1326  //delete m_buffer;
1327 
1328  m_msize = size;
1329  init();
1330 
1331  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Resizing DX buffer...");
1332  //ARK2D::getLog()->w("Will not draw something. D3D buffer is the wrong size");
1333  //return;
1334  //ARK2D::getLog()->v("realloc");
1335  //realloc(r.pData, size);
1336  }
1337 
1338  D3D11_MAPPED_SUBRESOURCE r;
1339  //ZeroMemory(&r, sizeof(D3D11_MAPPED_SUBRESOURCE));
1340 
1341  HRESULT hr = context->Map(m_buffer, NULL, D3D11_MAP_WRITE_DISCARD, NULL, &r);
1342  if (FAILED(hr)) {
1343  ErrorDialog::createAndShow(StringUtil::append("Failed to update DirectX 11 VBO.", DX_GetError(hr)));
1344  exit(0);
1345  }
1346 
1347 
1348  memcpy(r.pData, data, size);
1349  context->Unmap(m_buffer, 0);
1350 
1351  //m_msize = size;
1352 
1353  #endif
1354  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1355  }
1356  void VBO::bind() {
1357  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1358  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, m_id);
1359  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1360 
1361  #endif
1362  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1363  }
1364  void VBO::unbind() {
1365  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1366  glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
1367  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1368 
1369  #endif
1370  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1371  }
1372 
1373  QuadVBO::QuadVBO(): VBO(), m_width(2), m_height(4) {
1374  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1375  //setSize( sizeof(Renderer_DX_InterleavingGeometryVertexData)*4 );
1376  setSize(sizeof(Renderer_DX_InterleavingTextureVertexData) * 4);
1377  #endif
1378  }
1379  void QuadVBO::setWidth(int w) {
1380  m_width = w;
1381  }
1382  void QuadVBO::setHeight(int h) {
1383  m_height = h;
1384  }
1385  void QuadVBO::setData(void* data, unsigned int size) {
1386  VBO::setData(data, size);
1387  }
1388  void QuadVBO::setData(float* data) {
1389  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1390 
1391  if (m_width == 0 || m_height == 0) { return; }
1392  /*#ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_VS
1393  if (sizeof(float) * m_width * m_height != sizeof(data)) {
1394  ARK2D::getLog()->w("Invalid buffer. Size mis-match.");
1395  ARK2D::getLog()->w(StringUtil::append("buffer: ", sizeof(float) * m_width * m_height));
1396  ARK2D::getLog()->w(StringUtil::append("data: ", sizeof(data)));
1397  }
1398  #endif*/
1399 
1400  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float) * m_width * m_height, data, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
1401  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1402  VBO::setData((void*) data, sizeof(float) * m_width * m_height);
1403  #endif
1404  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1405  }
1406  void QuadVBO::setData(unsigned char* data) {
1407  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1408 
1409  if (m_width == 0 || m_height == 0) { return; }
1410 
1411  /*#ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_VS
1412  if (sizeof(unsigned char) * m_width * m_height != sizeof(data)) {
1413  ARK2D::getLog()->w("Invalid buffer. Size mis-match.");
1414  ARK2D::getLog()->w(StringUtil::append("buffer: ", sizeof(unsigned char) * m_width * m_height));
1415  ARK2D::getLog()->w(StringUtil::append("data: ", sizeof(data)));
1416  }
1417  #endif*/
1418 
1419  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(unsigned char) * m_width * m_height, data, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
1420  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1421  VBO::setData((void*) data, sizeof(unsigned char) * m_width * m_height);
1422  #endif
1423  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1424  }
1425 
1426  Mat44VBO::Mat44VBO(): VBO() {
1427  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1428  setSize( sizeof(float)*16 );
1429  #endif
1430  }
1431  void Mat44VBO::setData(float* data) {
1432  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1433  glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, sizeof(float) * 16, data, GL_DYNAMIC_DRAW);
1434  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1435  VBO::setData((void*) data, sizeof(float) * 16);
1436  #endif
1437  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1438  }
1439  void Mat44VBO::bind() {
1440  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1441  //setData()
1442  #endif
1443  }
1444 
1445  signed int VAO::s_currentVAO = -1;
1446  VAO::VAO(): m_id(0) { }
1447  signed int VAO::getId() {
1448  return m_id;
1449  }
1450  void VAO::init() {
1451  if (FBO::isVAOSupported()) {
1452  glGenVertexArraysARK( 1, &m_id );
1453  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1454  }
1455  }
1456  bool VAO::bind() {
1457  if (s_currentVAO == (signed int) m_id) { return false; }
1458 
1459  if (FBO::isVAOSupported()) {
1460  glBindVertexArrayARK(m_id);
1461  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1462  }
1463  s_currentVAO = (signed int) m_id;
1464  return true;
1465  }
1466

1468 
1469  // renderer
1470  Renderer::Renderer():
1471  m_DefaultFont(NULL),
1472  m_Font(NULL),
1473  m_DrawColor(255, 255, 255),
1474  m_MaskColor(255, 0, 255),
1475  m_LineWidth(1),
1476  m_pointSize(1),
1477  m_blendMode(BLEND_NORMAL),
1478  m_ScissorBoxColors()
1479  {
1480  //m_DefaultFont = new BMFont("data/calibri.fnt", "data/calibri.bmp", Color::magenta);
1481  //m_Font = m_DefaultFont;
1482  }
1483  void Renderer::preinit() {
1484  s_matrixProjection = new MatrixStack(MatrixStack::TYPE_PROJECTION);
1485  s_matrixModelView = new MatrixStack(MatrixStack::TYPE_MODELVIEW);
1486  s_matrix = s_matrixModelView;
1487  }
1488  void Renderer::init() {
1489  // this should be called when opengl is set up and ready to start loading shaders and crap
1490  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Renderer::init");
1491  #ifdef SHADER_SUPPORT
1492 
1493  bool fbosupport = FBO::isSupported();
1494 
1495  #if (defined(ARK2D_ANDROID) || defined(ARK2D_IPHONE))
1496  glGenVertexArraysOES = NULL;
1497  glBindVertexArrayOES = NULL;
1498 
1499  #if defined(ARK2D_ANDROID)
1500 
1501  if (FBO::isVAOSupported()) {
1502  glGenVertexArraysOES = (PFNGLGENVERTEXARRAYSOESPROC) eglGetProcAddress("glGenVertexArraysOES");
1503  glBindVertexArrayOES = (PFNGLBINDVERTEXARRAYOESPROC) eglGetProcAddress("glBindVertexArrayOES");
1504  }
1505 
1506  #endif
1507 
1508  #endif
1509 
1510 
1511 
1512  #if defined (ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1513  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Creating Matrix Buffer...");
1514  ID3D11Device* device = ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_device;
1515 
1516  CD3D11_BUFFER_DESC bufferDesc(sizeof(Renderer_DX_ModelViewProjectionMatrixBuffer), D3D11_BIND_CONSTANT_BUFFER);
1517  HRESULT result = device->CreateBuffer(&bufferDesc, NULL, &s_d3d_matrixBuffer);
1518  if (FAILED(result)) {
1519  ErrorDialog::createAndShow("Could not create Matrix Buffer.");
1520  exit(0);
1521  }
1522  s_d3d_matrixBufferDesc = bufferDesc;
1523 
1524  s_d3d_matrixBufferData = new Renderer_DX_ModelViewProjectionMatrixBuffer();
1525 
1526  s_vboMatrixProjection->m_indexType = D3D11_BIND_CONSTANT_BUFFER;
1527  s_vboMatrixModelView->m_indexType = D3D11_BIND_CONSTANT_BUFFER;
1528  s_vboQuadVerts->m_indexType = D3D11_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER;
1529  s_vboQuadTexCoords->m_indexType = D3D11_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER; // not used?
1530  s_vboQuadColors->m_indexType = D3D11_BIND_VERTEX_BUFFER; // not used?
1531  s_vboIndices->m_indexType = D3D11_BIND_INDEX_BUFFER;
1532 
1533  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Created Matrix Buffer.");
1534  #endif
1535 
1536  s_vboMatrixProjection->init();
1537  s_vboMatrixModelView->init();
1538 
1539  s_vaoQuad->init();
1540 
1541  s_vboQuadVerts->init();
1542  s_vboQuadVerts->setWidth(2);
1543  s_vboQuadVerts->setHeight(4);
1544 
1545  s_vboQuadTexCoords->init();
1546  s_vboQuadTexCoords->setWidth(2);
1547  s_vboQuadTexCoords->setHeight(4);
1548 
1549  s_vboQuadColors->init();
1550  s_vboQuadColors->setWidth(4);
1551  s_vboQuadColors->setHeight(4);
1552 
1553  s_vboIndices->setSize(sizeof(unsigned int) * 6);
1554  s_vboIndices->init();
1555 
1556  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1557 
1558 
1559  // Regular geometry shader
1560  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Geometry Shader: Init");
1561  Shader* s = new Shader();
1562  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1563 
1564  #ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_PHONE_8
1565 
1566  file_get_contents_binary_result geometryVertexShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_binary("ark2d/shaders/geometry-dx11-vertex.cso");
1567  file_get_contents_binary_result geometryFragmentShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_binary("ark2d/shaders/geometry-dx11-pixel.cso");
1568 
1569  //String* geometryVertexShaderStruct = Resource::get("ark2d/shaders/geometry-dx11-vertex.cso")->asString();
1570  //String* geometryFragmentShaderStruct = Resource::get("ark2d/shaders/geometry-dx11-pixel.cso")->asString();
1571 
1572  const char* geometryVertexShader = (const char*)geometryVertexShaderStruct.data;
1573  const char* geometryFragmentShader = (const char*)geometryFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1574 
1575  unsigned int geometryVertexShaderLen = geometryVertexShaderStruct.len;
1576  unsigned int geometryFragmentShaderLen = geometryFragmentShaderStruct.len;
1577 
1578  #else
1579  // Compiled .cso files
1580  GameContainerARK2DResource geometryVertexShaderStruct = GameContainerPlatform::getARK2DResourceWithLength(ARK2D_DX11_GEOM_VS, ARK2D_RESOURCE_TYPE_SHADER);
1581  GameContainerARK2DResource geometryFragmentShaderStruct = GameContainerPlatform::getARK2DResourceWithLength(ARK2D_DX11_GEOM_PS, ARK2D_RESOURCE_TYPE_SHADER);
1582 
1583  const char* geometryVertexShader = (const char*) geometryVertexShaderStruct.data;
1584  const char* geometryFragmentShader = (const char*) geometryFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1585 
1586  unsigned int geometryVertexShaderLen = geometryVertexShaderStruct.length;
1587  unsigned int geometryFragmentShaderLen = geometryFragmentShaderStruct.length;
1588  #endif
1589 
1590  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) geometryVertexShader, geometryVertexShaderLen);
1591  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) geometryFragmentShader, geometryFragmentShaderLen);
1592 
1593  //ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Vertex Resource Size (4): ", geometryVertexShaderLen));
1594  //ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Fragment Resource Size (4): ", geometryFragmentShaderLen));
1595 
1596  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1597  #if defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_ES_2_0)
1598 
1599  #ifdef ARK2D_ANDROID
1600  // TODO:
1601  // ... use Resource::get() as these are always within the APK.
1602 
1603  RawDataReturns* geometryVertexShaderStruct = Resource::getRawData("assets/ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsles100.vertex");
1604  RawDataReturns* geometryFragmentShaderStruct = Resource::getRawData("assets/ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsles100.fragment"); //->asString();
1605 
1606  char* newtextbuffer = (char*) realloc(geometryVertexShaderStruct->data, geometryVertexShaderStruct->size+1);
1607  newtextbuffer[geometryVertexShaderStruct->size] = '\0';
1608  geometryVertexShaderStruct->data = newtextbuffer;
1609 
1610  char* newtextbuffer2 = (char*) realloc(geometryFragmentShaderStruct->data, geometryFragmentShaderStruct->size+1);
1611  newtextbuffer2[geometryFragmentShaderStruct->size] = '\0';
1612  geometryFragmentShaderStruct->data = newtextbuffer2;
1613 
1614  const char* geometryVertexShader = (const char*) geometryVertexShaderStruct->data;
1615  const char* geometryFragmentShader = (const char*) geometryFragmentShaderStruct->data;
1616 
1617  unsigned int geometryVertexShaderLen = geometryVertexShaderStruct->size; //strlen(textureVertexShader);
1618  unsigned int geometryFragmentShaderLen = geometryFragmentShaderStruct->size; //strlen(textureFragmentShader);
1619 
1620  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) geometryVertexShader, geometryVertexShaderLen);
1621  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) geometryFragmentShader, geometryFragmentShaderLen);
1622 
1623  delete geometryVertexShaderStruct;
1624  delete geometryFragmentShaderStruct;
1625 
1626  #else
1627 
1628  file_get_contents_text_result geometryVertexShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsles100.vertex");
1629  file_get_contents_text_result geometryFragmentShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsles100.fragment");
1630 
1631  const char* geometryVertexShader = (const char*) geometryVertexShaderStruct.data;
1632  const char* geometryFragmentShader = (const char*) geometryFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1633 
1634  unsigned int geometryVertexShaderLen = geometryVertexShaderStruct.len; //strlen(geometryVertexShader);
1635  unsigned int geometryFragmentShaderLen = geometryFragmentShaderStruct.len; //strlen(geometryFragmentShader);
1636 
1637  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) geometryVertexShader, geometryVertexShaderLen);
1638  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) geometryFragmentShader, geometryFragmentShaderLen);
1639 
1640  #endif
1641 
1642  #elif defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_3_2)
1643  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Trying GLSL version 150.");
1644  file_get_contents_text_result geometryVertexShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsl150-vertex.txt");
1645  file_get_contents_text_result geometryFragmentShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsl150-fragment.txt");
1646 
1647  const char* geometryVertexShader = (const char*) geometryVertexShaderStruct.data;
1648  const char* geometryFragmentShader = (const char*) geometryFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1649 
1650  unsigned int geometryVertexShaderLen = geometryVertexShaderStruct.len;
1651  unsigned int geometryFragmentShaderLen = geometryFragmentShaderStruct.len;
1652 
1653  bool glsl150_vertex_error = false;
1654  bool glsl150_fragment_error = false;
1655 
1656  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) geometryVertexShader, geometryVertexShaderLen);
1657  glsl150_vertex_error = s->hasError();
1658 
1659  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) geometryFragmentShader, geometryFragmentShaderLen);
1660  glsl150_fragment_error = s->hasError();
1661 
1662  if (glsl150_vertex_error || glsl150_fragment_error) {
1663  ARK2D::getLog()->w("GLSL version 150 had a problem. Trying GLSL version 130.");
1664  file_get_contents_text_result geometryVertexShaderStruct2 = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsl130-vertex.txt");
1665  file_get_contents_text_result geometryFragmentShaderStruct2 = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/geometry-glsl130-fragment.txt");
1666 
1667  const char* geometryVertexShader2 = (const char*) geometryVertexShaderStruct2.data;
1668  const char* geometryFragmentShader2 = (const char*) geometryFragmentShaderStruct2.data;
1669 
1670  unsigned int geometryVertexShaderLen2 = geometryVertexShaderStruct2.len;
1671  unsigned int geometryFragmentShaderLen2 = geometryFragmentShaderStruct2.len;
1672 
1673  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) geometryVertexShader2, geometryVertexShaderLen2);
1674  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) geometryFragmentShader2, geometryFragmentShaderLen2);
1675 
1676  delete geometryVertexShaderStruct2.data;
1677  delete geometryFragmentShaderStruct2.data;
1678  }
1679  #endif
1680  #endif
1681 
1682 
1683  //ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Vertex Shader len:", geometryVertexShaderLen));
1684  //ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Fragment Shader len:", geometryFragmentShaderLen));
1685 
1686 
1687 
1688  //#ifdef ARK2D_MACINTOSH
1689  // glBindAttribLocation();
1690  //#endif
1691 
1692 
1693  #ifdef ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX
1694  s->setName("geometry-dx11");
1695  #endif
1696  //glBindAttribLocation(s->getId(), 0, "ark_ModelViewMatrix");
1697  //glBindAttribLocation(s->getId(), 1, "ark_ProjectionMatrix");
1698  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Geometry Shader: Bind Locations");
1699  s->bindAttributeLocation(0, "ark_VertexPosition");
1700  s->bindAttributeLocation(1, "ark_VertexColorIn");
1701  s->bindFragmentDataLocation(0, "ark_FragColor");
1702 
1703  //glEnableVertexAttribArray(s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexPosition);
1704  //glEnableVertexAttribArray(s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexColorIn);
1705 
1706  s->link();
1707  s->linkDX();
1708 
1709 
1710 
1711 
1712  RendererState::start(RendererState::SHADER, s->getId());
1713 
1714  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1715  /*s->initVariables();
1716  s_shaderBasicGeometry_ProjectionMatrix = s->getInittedVariable("ark_ProjectionMatrix");
1717  s_shaderBasicGeometry_ModelViewMatrix = s->getInittedVariable("ark_ModelViewMatrix");
1718  s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexPosition = s->getInittedVariable("ark_VertexPosition");
1719  s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexColorIn = s->getInittedVariable("ark_VertexColorIn");*/
1720 
1721  s_shaderBasicGeometry_ModelViewMatrix = s->getUniformVariable("ark_ModelViewMatrix");
1722  s_shaderBasicGeometry_ProjectionMatrix = s->getUniformVariable("ark_ProjectionMatrix");
1723  s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexPosition = 0; //s->getAttributeVariableVertexArray("ark_VertexPosition");
1724  s_shaderBasicGeometry_VertexColorIn = 1; //s->getAttributeVariableVertexArray("ark_VertexColorIn");
1725 
1726  //s->enableVertexAttribArray(0);
1727  //s->enableVertexAttribArray(1);
1728 
1729  s_shaderBasicGeometry = s;
1730  RendererState::start(RendererState::GEOMETRY);
1731 
1732  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1733 
1734  // Texture Shader
1735  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Texture Shader Init");
1736  s = new Shader();
1737  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1738 
1739  // TODO: replace with texture shader...
1740  #ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_PHONE_8
1741 
1742  file_get_contents_binary_result textureVertexShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_binary("ark2d/shaders/texture-dx11-vertex.cso");
1743  file_get_contents_binary_result textureFragmentShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_binary("ark2d/shaders/texture-dx11-pixel.cso");
1744 
1745  //String* textureVertexShaderStruct = Resource::get("ark2d/shaders/geometry-dx11-vertex.cso")->asString();
1746  //String* textureFragmentShaderStruct = Resource::get("ark2d/shaders/geometry-dx11-pixel.cso")->asString();
1747 
1748  const char* textureVertexShader = (const char*)textureVertexShaderStruct.data;
1749  const char* textureFragmentShader = (const char*)textureFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1750 
1751  unsigned int textureVertexShaderLen = textureVertexShaderStruct.len;
1752  unsigned int textureFragmentShaderLen = textureFragmentShaderStruct.len;
1753 
1754  #else
1755  // TODO switch out values here.
1756  GameContainerARK2DResource textureVertexShaderStruct = GameContainerPlatform::getARK2DResourceWithLength(ARK2D_DX11_GEOM_VS, ARK2D_RESOURCE_TYPE_SHADER);
1757  GameContainerARK2DResource textureFragmentShaderStruct = GameContainerPlatform::getARK2DResourceWithLength(ARK2D_DX11_GEOM_PS, ARK2D_RESOURCE_TYPE_SHADER);
1758 
1759  const char* textureVertexShader = (const char*) textureVertexShaderStruct.data;
1760  const char* textureFragmentShader = (const char*) textureFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1761 
1762  unsigned int textureVertexShaderLen = textureVertexShaderStruct.length;
1763  unsigned int textureFragmentShaderLen = textureFragmentShaderStruct.length;
1764  #endif
1765 
1766  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) textureVertexShader, textureVertexShaderLen);
1767  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) textureFragmentShader, textureFragmentShaderLen);
1768 
1769  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1770  #if defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_ES_2_0)
1771 
1772  #ifdef ARK2D_ANDROID
1773  // TODO:
1774  // ... use Resource::get() as these are always within the APK.
1775 
1776  RawDataReturns* textureVertexShaderStruct = Resource::getRawData("assets/ark2d/shaders/texture-glsles100.vertex"); //->asString();
1777  RawDataReturns* textureFragmentShaderStruct = Resource::getRawData("assets/ark2d/shaders/texture-glsles100.fragment"); //->asString();
1778 
1779  char* newtextbuffer3 = (char*) realloc(textureVertexShaderStruct->data, textureVertexShaderStruct->size+1);
1780  newtextbuffer3[textureVertexShaderStruct->size] = '\0';
1781  textureVertexShaderStruct->data = newtextbuffer3;
1782 
1783  char* newtextbuffer4 = (char*) realloc(textureFragmentShaderStruct->data, textureFragmentShaderStruct->size+1);
1784  newtextbuffer4[textureFragmentShaderStruct->size] = '\0';
1785  textureFragmentShaderStruct->data = newtextbuffer4;
1786 
1787  const char* textureVertexShader = (const char*) textureVertexShaderStruct->data;
1788  const char* textureFragmentShader = (const char*) textureFragmentShaderStruct->data;//->getc().c_str();
1789 
1790  unsigned int textureVertexShaderLen = textureVertexShaderStruct->size; //strlen(textureVertexShader);
1791  unsigned int textureFragmentShaderLen = textureFragmentShaderStruct->size; //strlen(textureFragmentShader);
1792 
1793  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) textureVertexShader, textureVertexShaderLen);
1794  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) textureFragmentShader, textureFragmentShaderLen);
1795 
1796  delete textureVertexShaderStruct;
1797  delete textureFragmentShaderStruct;
1798  #else
1799 
1800  file_get_contents_text_result textureVertexShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/texture-glsles100.vertex");
1801  file_get_contents_text_result textureFragmentShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/texture-glsles100.fragment");
1802 
1803  const char* textureVertexShader = (const char*) textureVertexShaderStruct.data;
1804  const char* textureFragmentShader = (const char*) textureFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1805 
1806  unsigned int textureVertexShaderLen = textureVertexShaderStruct.len; //strlen(textureVertexShader);
1807  unsigned int textureFragmentShaderLen = textureFragmentShaderStruct.len; //strlen(textureFragmentShader);
1808 
1809  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) textureVertexShader, textureVertexShaderLen);
1810  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) textureFragmentShader, textureFragmentShaderLen);
1811 
1812  #endif
1813 
1814 
1815 
1816  #elif defined(ARK2D_OPENGL_3_2)
1817  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Trying GLSL version 150.");
1818  file_get_contents_text_result textureVertexShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/texture-glsl150-vertex.txt");
1819  file_get_contents_text_result textureFragmentShaderStruct = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/texture-glsl150-fragment.txt");
1820 
1821  const char* textureVertexShader = (const char*) textureVertexShaderStruct.data;
1822  const char* textureFragmentShader = (const char*) textureFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1823 
1824  unsigned int textureVertexShaderLen = textureVertexShaderStruct.len; //strlen(textureVertexShader);
1825  unsigned int textureFragmentShaderLen = textureFragmentShaderStruct.len; //strlen(textureFragmentShader);
1826 
1827  bool glsl150_t_vertex_error = false;
1828  bool glsl150_t_fragment_error = false;
1829 
1830  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) textureVertexShader, textureVertexShaderLen);
1831  glsl150_t_vertex_error = s->hasError();
1832 
1833  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) textureFragmentShader, textureFragmentShaderLen);
1834  glsl150_t_fragment_error = s->hasError();
1835 
1836  if (glsl150_t_vertex_error || glsl150_t_fragment_error) {
1837  ARK2D::getLog()->w("GLSL version 150 had a problem. Trying GLSL version 130.");
1838  file_get_contents_text_result textureVertexShaderStruct2 = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/texture-glsl130-vertex.txt");
1839  file_get_contents_text_result textureFragmentShaderStruct2 = FileUtil::file_get_contents_text("ark2d/shaders/texture-glsl130-fragment.txt");
1840 
1841  const char* textureVertexShader2 = (const char*) textureVertexShaderStruct2.data;
1842  const char* textureFragmentShader2 = (const char*) textureFragmentShaderStruct2.data;
1843 
1844  unsigned int textureVertexShaderLen2 = textureVertexShaderStruct2.len; //strlen(textureVertexShader);
1845  unsigned int textureFragmentShaderLen2 = textureFragmentShaderStruct2.len; //strlen(textureFragmentShader);
1846 
1847  s->addVertexShaderFromData((void*) textureVertexShader2, textureVertexShaderLen2);
1848  s->addFragmentShaderFromData((void*) textureFragmentShader2, textureFragmentShaderLen2);
1849 
1850  delete textureVertexShaderStruct2.data;
1851  delete textureFragmentShaderStruct2.data;
1852  }
1853 
1854  #endif
1855  #endif
1856 
1857 
1858 
1859  //ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Vertex Shader len:", textureVertexShaderLen));
1860  //ARK2D::getLog()->v(StringUtil::append("Fragment Shader len:", textureFragmentShaderLen));
1861 
1862 
1863  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1864 
1865  //#ifdef ARK2D_MACINTOSH
1866  //glBindAttribLocation(s->getId(), 0, "ark_ModelViewMatrix");
1867  //glBindAttribLocation(s->getId(), 1, "ark_ProjectionMatrix");
1868  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Texture Shader: Bind Locations");
1869  s->bindAttributeLocation(0, "ark_TextureId");
1870  s->bindAttributeLocation(1, "ark_VertexPosition");
1871  s->bindAttributeLocation(2, "ark_VertexTexCoordIn");
1872  s->bindAttributeLocation(3, "ark_VertexColorIn");
1873  s->bindFragmentDataLocation(0, "ark_FragColor");
1874  //#endif
1875 
1876  #ifdef ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX
1877  s->setName("texture-dx11");
1878  #endif
1879 
1880 
1881  s->link();
1882  s->linkDX();
1883 
1884  RendererState::start(RendererState::SHADER, s->getId());
1885 
1886 
1887 
1888  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1889 
1890  s_shaderBasicTexture_ModelViewMatrix = s->getUniformVariable("ark_ModelViewMatrix");
1891  s_shaderBasicTexture_ProjectionMatrix = s->getUniformVariable("ark_ProjectionMatrix");
1892 
1893  s_shaderBasicTexture_TextureId = s->getUniformVariable("ark_TextureId");
1894  s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexPosition = 1; //s->getAttributeVariableVertexArray("ark_VertexPosition");
1895  s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexTexCoordIn = 2; //s->getAttributeVariableVertexArray("ark_VertexTexCoordIn");
1896  s_shaderBasicTexture_VertexColorIn = 3; //s->getAttributeVariableVertexArray("ark_VertexColorIn");
1897 
1898  //s->enableVertexAttribArray(1);
1899  //s->enableVertexAttribArray(2);
1900  //s->enableVertexAttribArray(3);
1901 
1902  RendererState::start(RendererState::GEOMETRY);
1903  s_shaderBasicTexture = s;
1904 
1905  // Free String* memory.
1906  //#ifdef ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX
1907  //#ifdef ARK2D_WINDOWS_PHONE_8
1908  #ifdef ARK2D_ANDROID
1909  // delete geometryVertexShaderStruct;
1910  // delete geometryFragmentShaderStruct;
1911 
1912  // delete textureVertexShaderStruct;
1913  // delete textureFragmentShaderStruct;
1914  #else
1915  delete geometryVertexShaderStruct.data;
1916  delete geometryFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1917 
1918  delete textureVertexShaderStruct.data;
1919  delete textureFragmentShaderStruct.data;
1920  #endif
1921  // #endif
1922  //#endif
1923 
1924 
1925  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1926 
1927  #endif
1928  ARK2D::getLog()->v("Renderer::init complete");
1929  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1930  }
1931 
1932  void* Renderer::readPixels(int x, int y, int w, int h) {
1933  //void* data[w * h];// = malloc(w * h * 8);
1934  //glReadPixels(x, y, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, &data);
1935 
1936  GLubyte* pixels = NULL;
1937  /*{
1938  int size = w * h * 4;
1939  GLubyte* pixels = new GLubyte[size];
1940  if (pixels == NULL) return NULL;
1941  glReadPixels(x, y, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels);
1942  }*/
1943 
1944  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1945  {
1946  int size = (w * h) * 4;
1947  pixels = new GLubyte[size];
1948  if (pixels == NULL) return NULL;
1949  glReadPixels(x, y, w, h, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels);
1950  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1951 
1952  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1953  }
1954  #endif
1955 
1956  //delete[] pixels;
1957  return pixels;
1958  }
1959  void Renderer::flush() {
1960  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1961  glFlush();
1962  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1963  ARK2D::getContainer()->m_platformSpecific.m_deviceContext->Flush();
1964  #endif
1965  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1966  }
1967  void Renderer::finish() {
1968  #if defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_OPENGL)
1969  glFinish();
1970  #elif defined(ARK2D_RENDERER_DIRECTX)
1971 
1972  #endif
1973  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1974  }
1975

1977  m_Font = f;
1978  }

1980  m_DefaultFont = f;
1981  }

1983  ARK::Font::Font* Renderer::getFont() const {
1984  return m_Font;
1985  }
1986  ARK::Font::Font* Renderer::getDefaultFont() const {
1987  return m_DefaultFont;
1988  }

1990  void Renderer::translate(int x, int y) const {
1991  // glTranslatef(x,y,0);
1992  s_matrix->translate(x, y, 0);
1993 
1994  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
1995  //glLoadMatrixf((float*)s_matrix->pointer());
1996  glTranslatef(x, y, 0);
1997  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
1998  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
1999  #endif
2000  }
2001  void Renderer::translate(float x, float y) const {
2002  //glTranslatef(x,y,0);
2003  s_matrix->translate(x, y, 0.0f);
2004 
2005  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
2006  //glLoadMatrixf((float*)s_matrix->pointer());
2007  glTranslatef(x, y, 0);
2008  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
2009  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
2010  #endif
2011  }
2012  void Renderer::translate(float x, float y, float z) const {
2013  s_matrix->translate(x, y, z);
2014 
2015  #ifndef NO_FIXED_FUNCTION_PIPELINE
2016  glTranslatef(x, y, 0);
2017  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
2018  RendererStats::s_glCalls++;
2019  #endif
2020  }

2054  void Renderer::scale(float x, float y) const {

2059  //glLoadMatrixf((float*)s_matrix->pointer());

2061  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();

2063  #endif
2064  }

2070  showAnyGlErrorAndExitMacro();
